nexDevelopment

Building great apps for the Windows platform

nexDevelopment

Building great apps for the Windows platform

Apps

nexMuni

nexMuni is the easiest way to see SF Muni real time departures and nearby stops on Windows Phone. It finds the stops nearest you and shows both outbound and inbound times for all routes at a stop.

nexBart

Use nexBart to see upcoming departure times for each line and plan a route to your destination.

In development for Windows Phone 8.1

11th

Sorting The NextBus API

How I made the transit data provided by NextBus more organized and easier to use by creating the NextBus-Sort parser.

Who

Jimmy Garrido

Developer

Jimmy is currently attending San Francisco State University for a B.S in Computer Science. His skills include C#, Java, and C++ and he has developed apps for Windows Phone and Android.
